description: Insert the nano USB receiver into your computer's USB port and you're ready to go without synching the mouse and the receiver. 2.4 GHz frequency provides an instant and secure connection with out interference from other electronic devices up to 20ft.Glide smoothly across your desktop surface with a 1600 dpi high performance laser sensor. The wireless laser notebook mouse works on most surfaces such as wood grain, frosted glass and others than optical mice cannot work on. The USB nano receiver stows underneath the mouse making packing and traveling convenient.
title: iHome Wireless Laser Notebook Mouse - Blue (IH-M171ZN)
